thread.title: Gran Bretagna, produzione industriale gennaio +1,3% su mese, +1,6% su anno Macroeconomia

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Gran Bretagna, produzione industriale gennaio +1,3% su mese, +1,6% su anno Macroeconomia
text: LONDRA, 9 marzo (Reuters) - The Office for National Statistics released the following data on British industrial production and construction output on Friday. (percent changes) INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION JAN DEC (PREV DEC) F'CAST Mth-on-mth change 1.3 -1.3 (-1.3) 1.5 Yr-on-yr change 1.6 0.0 (0.0) 1.8 3-mth/3-mth change 0.2 0.5 (0.5) MANUFACTURING OUTPUT Mth-on-mth change 0.1 0.3 (0.3) 0.2 Yr-on-yr change 2.7 1.4 (1.4) 2.8 3-mth/3-mth change 0.9 1.3 (1.3) MINING AND QUARRYING INCLUDING OIL AND GAS EXTRACTION Month-on-month change 23.5 -19.1 (-19.1) Yr-on-yr change 4.1 -14.3 (-14.3) OIL AND GAS EXTRACTION Month-on-month change 32.3 -24.2 (-24.2) Yr-on-yr change 4.3 -19.9 (-19.9) ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING Month-on-month change -3.4 0.9 (0.9) Yr-on-yr change -4.5 0.8 (0.8) WATER SUPPLY, SEWERAGE AND WASTE MANAGEMENT Month-on-month change -0.4 0.6 (0.6) Yr-on-yr change -1.2 0.6 (0.6)
